post:
Tired of the pump and dump scams, fly by night host or kiddie host? Want a company that will actually support you after the sale has been made?

We thought so...

Cortex Networks LLC. was created over a year ago with these things in mind. We work tirelessly to provide the best all around service to our clients whether it be choosing the data centers we use, to the hardware we buy or the end user support we provide.

All of our servers are heavily monitored around the clock to make sure that they are running efficiently and not overloaded or abused. Most spammers or abusers are shutdown within minutes, not hours or days like most host.

New to web hosting and have questions? just shoot us an email and we would be happy to assist you in choosing the correct solution for your needs.


All Accounts Include:

  • Industry Standard SolusVM Control Panel
    Premium Bandwidth
    Full Root Access
    Semi-Managed Support - Need help? Just ask...
    Free VPS monitoring with email alerts (5 minute intervals)*
    Free Monthly Offsite VPS Container Backups*

* By request


All VPS Nodes Feature:

  • Latest Generation Intel E3-1270 SandyBridge Processors (Faster than dual Xeon 5500 series processors!!!)
    Enterprise Grade SATA-II Hard Drives
    Adaptec Hardware RAID Controllers
    High Speed, Fully Redundant RAID 10 Hard Drive Arrays

FAQ:

Q: What virtualization technology do you use?
A: We use OpenVZ and our VPS manager is SolusVM

Q: How soon will my VPS be setup?
A: Your VPS will be setup within 48 hours, however generally they are setup within a few hours

Q: Is Warez, torrents, or warez linking allowed?
A: No! We are located in the USA and only allow legal content in the United States

Q: Is adult content allowed?
A: Yes! However, please keep in mind all content must be legal in the USA

Q: Do you allow bulk email or spam?
A: No we do not allow SPAM or bulk emailing on our network.

Q: How long have you been in business?
A: We have been in business for over a year and show no signs of slowing down. We are here for the long haul.

Q: Do you have 24/7 support?
A: Yes! We have 24/7 helpdesk support and live support during 9am - 9pm EST.

Q: Can you create a custom plan for me?
A: Of course! Just submit a proposal to our sales team, sales@cortexnetworks.com and we will get back to you very quickly.

Q: Are you a real company?
A: Yes, we are a fully legit company and are registered as a LLC with the state of Florida. You can see our Articles of Organization on the sunbiz.org website Here


For any sales questions please visit: http://www.cortexnetworks.com/
or email sales@cortexnetworks.com
